snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration will hold a public meeting on Oct. 22 to provide updates on the sweeping recall of defective Takata airbags.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration will conduct public meeting Oct 22 to update latest progress in Takata defective airbags recall.
